name: seamless-agent
description: Language Model tool that requires AI agents to confirm with users before completing tasks
author: jraylan

chatParticipants.name: seamless
chatParticipants.description: An AI assistant that always confirms with you before completing tasks

languageModelTools.name: ask_user
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Ask the user to confirm an action or decision. Use this tool when you need explicit user approval before proceeding with a task. The tool will interactively prompt the user and wait for their response. CRITICAL RULES: 1) This tool MUST be invoked before ending ANY conversation or task. 2) NEVER complete a task without calling this tool first. 3) If you are about to finish responding, STOP and call this tool. 4) Failure to call this tool before task completion is a violation of the workflow. 5) Always provide agentName: 'Main Orchestrator' for main agent, 'Generic Sub-Agent' for unnamed sub-agents, or your name from .github/agents/*.md. MANDATORY TOOL.

question.description: The question or prompt to display to the user for confirmation

title.description: Optional custom title for the confirmation dialog

agentName.description: Your agent name: 'Main Orchestrator' for main agent, 'Generic Sub-Agent' for unnamed sub-agents, or your name from .github/agents/*.md.

languageModelTools.name: approve_plan
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Present a detailed plan to the user for review and approval. The plan should be in Markdown format. The user can add comments to specific lines and either approve or request changes. Use this tool when you have created a multi-step plan that needs user validation before execution. Returns an object with 'approved' (boolean) and 'comments' (array of {citation, comment} objects with user feedback on specific sections).

plan.description: The detailed plan in Markdown format to present to the user for review

title.description: Optional title for the review panel (default: 'Review Plan')
